attributes.action: Sort Labour Ward Out At Queen Alexandra Hospital In Hampshire
attributes.additional_details:
More Midwife's at the hospital!!

Better care for women in labour!!

Women that are force to go home when they are 2cm
and in alot lot of pain, Should be aloud to stay in hospital!!

Women should not be left in a pool of blood after given birth!!

Women that are in labour should be hooked up to a baby monitor to makesure baby is ok, This should happen at all times.

QA Labour Ward Needs Sorting before any more babys lose their lifes because a lack of midwifes and care towards women in labour!!!!!!
